name: Enemies to Allies
description: The Borg's request to join the Federation has sent shockwaves throughout the Federation. Even as they make their own gestures of goodwill, the wounds of the past are still raw for many. What is the future of the Borg?
rules:
-- Unique Augments, Borg, and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using L'Gaelia, Jurati, Freeman, Doopler Emissary, or Diplomats will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: L'Gaelia, Jurati, Freeman, Doopler Emissary, or Diplomats
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Ixtana'Rax
featured_crew.flavor: Ixtana'Rax tried his best to prevent his commander from being tricked by the imprisoned Defiant crew, but he was completely ignored.

featured_crew.name: Jurati
featured_crew.flavor: Having achieved harmony with the Borg Queen's consciousness, Jurati has forged a new and more humane collective aimed at saving lives.

featured_crew.name: Freeman
featured_crew.flavor: Captain of the Cerritos, Freeman has a flair for the dramatic, extensive second contact experience, and no time for Mariner’s shenanigans.

rewards.name: Borg Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Borg faction missions.

rewards.name: Augment Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Sisko
rewards.flavor: Promoted to Captain, Benjamin Sisko was recognized for his accomplishments as Commander of Deep Space Nine.

rewards.name: Borg Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Borg faction missions.

rewards.name: Augment Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Ixtana'Rax
rewards.flavor: Ixtana'Rax tried his best to prevent his commander from being tricked by the imprisoned Defiant crew, but he was completely ignored.

rewards.name: Freeman
rewards.flavor: Captain of the Cerritos, Freeman has a flair for the dramatic, extensive second contact experience, and no time for Mariner’s shenanigans.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Ixtana'Rax
rewards.flavor: Ixtana'Rax tried his best to prevent his commander from being tricked by the imprisoned Defiant crew, but he was completely ignored.

rewards.name: Freeman
rewards.flavor: Captain of the Cerritos, Freeman has a flair for the dramatic, extensive second contact experience, and no time for Mariner’s shenanigans.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

screens.text: "Captain! Help! We're under attack! It's the Borg! Oh, I like my biological distinctiveness, I don't wanna share it with anyone else! I mean, what if the rest of the Collective doesn't like me!? What if they think I think too much! What if--"

"I am sorry, I did not mean to frighten you. I was seeking Captain Freeman. With her reputation as an expert in first and second contact, I was hoping she might be able to help us with our request to join the Federation."

"Well now, flattery will get you everywhere. The Borg wanting to join the Federation, even if you are a separate Collective, is...shocking to say the least. And while relations with the Borg have come a long way, I'm afraid the R'ongovians have some concerns of their own."

"I am not here representing the R'ongovians, but on behalf of another species whose homeworld is part of the Protectorate. One that claims the Borg have destroyed their home. And this species does not believe the Borg should be allowed into the Federation."
"As you can see, Captain, this does complicate an already difficult situation. Think you can give us a hand?"
